document.full_text: paul valthaty of punjab is a cricketing foot soldier, a low-priced backup to the expensive international talent. two astounding performances in the span of four days have rocketed him from obscurity to fame.
document.title: cricket: paul valthaty bursts into starring role in indian premier league
lines_and_colors: paul valthaty of punjab is a cricketing foot soldier, a low-priced backup to the expensive international talent. two astounding performances in the span of four days have rocketed him from obscurity to fame.
